欠講: (けっこう) - cancellation of lecture or class
欠配: (けっぱい) - suspension of rations or payments
欠陥: (kekkan) - defeito, falha, imperfeição, deformidade, deficiência, escassez, lacuna
欠陥を補う: (けっかんをおぎなう) - to make up for a fault
欠陥商品: (けっかんしょうひん) - defective merchandise
欠陥車: (けっかんしゃ) - defective car; car with a (structural) defect
欠食児童: (けっしょくじどう) - schoolchild without lunch
欠餅: (かきもち) - mochi cut thin, dried, and baked or fried
次: (ji/shi/tsu/tsugi) - next , next, following, subsequent; stage, station
次々: (つぎつぎ) - in succession; one by one
次々に: (つぎつぎに) - one by one; one after another; successively
次々回: (じじかい) - the time after next
次々発: (じじはつ) - third train to depart (from now)
次々週: (じじしゅう) - the week after next
次から次へと: (つぎからつぎへと) - in succession; one after another
次ぐ: (つぐ) - to rank next to; to come after
次のように: (つぎのように) - in the following manner; as follows
次の例では: (つぎのれいでは) - in the following example
次の便: (つぎのびん) - next flight; next post
次の内閣: (つぎのないかく) - shadow cabinet; opposition party executive
次の回: (つぎのかい) - next inning; next time
次の実行完結文: (つぎのじっこうかんけつぶん) - next executable sentence
次の実行文: (つぎのじっこうぶん) - next executable statement
次世代: (じせだい) - next generation; future generation
次世代携帯電話: (じせだいけいたいでんわ) - next-generation mobile phone
次亜: (じあ) - hypo- -ous (indicating the lowest oxidation state); hypo- -ite
次亜硫酸: (じありゅうさん) - hyposulphurous acid; hyposulfurous acid
次元: (じげん) - dimension; perspective/point of reference/level (of something)
次元正則化: (じげんせいそくか) - dimensional regularisation; dimensional regularization
次善策: (じぜんさく) - plan B; alternative plan
次回予告: (じかいよこく) - preview of next installment (TV shows, podcasts, etc.)
次子: (じし) - the next child; second child
次官: (すけ) - assistant director (second highest of the four administrative positions of the ritsuryo period)
次客: (じきゃく) - second guest of honour (at a tea ceremony); second guest of honor
次巻: (じかん) - next volume (of a book, comic, etc.)
次期: (じき) - next term/next period; next version/next release
次期大統領: (じきだいとうりょう) - next president; president-elect
次条: (じじょう) - the next article; the next entry
次次: (つぎつぎ) - in succession; one by one
次次に: (つぎつぎに) - one by one; one after another; successively
次次発: (じじはつ) - third train to depart (from now)
次発: (じはつ) - second train to depart; following train; next train
次第: (shidai) - dependendo de; assim que, imediatamente (após), dependendo de; assim que, imediatamente (após); de acordo com; ordem, programa, precedência
次第に: (shidaini) - gradualmente (progredir para um estado); em sequência, em ordem, por sua vez
次第書き: (しだいがき) - printed program; printed programme
次郎柿: (じろうがき) - jiro (variety of sweet Japanese persimmon)
次鋒: (じほう) - second athlete to compete in a 5-on-5 team competition (kendo, judo, etc.)
次長: (じちょう) - vice-; assistant director; vice-director
次項: (じこう) - next clause; following paragraph; next item
欣々然: (きんきんぜん) - quite joyous; quite cheerful; quite happy
欣ぶ: (よろこぶ) - to be delighted/to be glad/to be pleased; to congratulate; to gratefully accept
欣喜雀躍: (きんきじゃくやく) - (yoji) jump up for joy
